49178.「どうやら 女神の黄玉石は\n 無事 光の河に捧げられたようです。:
The Yellow Goddess Gem was safely offered to
the River of Light.

49181.どこからともなく 声が 聞こえてくる。: A voice can be heard echoing from afar...

49183.<center>大いなる災い……\nその存在によって 魔瘴が\nアストルティアに:
A great evil...
By its existence, demon miasma has been
brought upon Astoltia.

49184.<center>……そして 今は\n数百年ごとに訪れる 魔瘴の荒ぶりし時。:
...and now, every several hundred years,
the miasma erupts again.

49185.<center>この機に乗じ 魔族どもは\n大いなる災厄を呼びよせんと 暗躍を始:
The demons, taking advantage of this chaos,
make their move, their goal to bring forth
a great evil.

49186.<center>存続か 滅亡か……。\nアストルティアは 試練の時を迎えた。:
Survival...or extinction?
This was Astoltia's trial.
